TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MarshalAsAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MarshalAsAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MarshalAsAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示如何在托管代码与非托管代码之间封送数据。

span.span: Indicates how to marshal the data between managed and unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此特性应用于参数、 字段或返回值。You can apply this attribute to parameters, fields, or return values. 此属性是可选的，因为每种数据类型都有默认封送处理行为。This attribute is optional, as each data type has a default marshaling behavior. 仅在给定的类型可以封送到多个类型时需要此属性。This attribute is only necessary when a given type can be marshaled to multiple types. 例如，封送到非托管代码为字符串、 、 ，或。For example, you can marshal a string to unmanaged code as either a , a , a , or a . 默认情况下，公共语言运行时封送字符串参数作为到 COM 方法。By default, the common language runtime marshals a string parameter as a to COM methods. 你可以将应用属性设为单独的字段或参数，使该特定的字符串作为封送处理而不是。You can apply the attribute to an individual field or parameter to cause that particular string to be marshaled as a instead of a . [Tlbexp.exe （类型库导出程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)将传递到公共语言运行时你封送处理的首选项。The [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) passes your marshaling preferences to the common language runtime. 某些参数和返回值具有不同的默认封送处理行为时用于 COM 互操作或平台调用。Some parameters and return values have different default marshaling behavior when used with COM interop or platform invoke. 默认情况下，运行时将封送字符串参数 （和值类型中的字段） 为平台调用来调用方法或函数。By default, the runtime marshals a string parameter (and fields in a value type) as a to a platform invoke method or function. 有关其他信息，请参阅[默认封送行为](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-behavior.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling Behavior](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-behavior.md). 在大多数情况下，该特性只标识非托管的数据使用的格式枚举，如下面的 C# 签名中所示：In most cases, the attribute simply identifies the format of the unmanaged data using the enumeration, as shown in the following C# signature: [!code-csharp[system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/cs/Signature1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/vb/Signature1.vb#2)] 某些枚举成员需要其他信息。Some enumeration members require additional information. 例如，需要其他信息时是。For example, additional information is needed when the is . 有关如何与数组一起使用此特性的完整说明，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For a complete description of how to use this attribute with arrays, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md). [Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)还将此特性应用到参数、 字段和返回值以指示输入的类型库中的数据类型不是相应的托管的数据类型的默认类型。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) also applies this attribute to parameters, fields, and return values to indicate that the data type in the input type library is not the default type for the corresponding managed data type. Tlbimp.exe 始终应用到和为清楚起见，无论输入的类型库中指定的类型的类型。Tlbimp.exe always applies the to and types for clarity, regardless of the type specified in the input type library. > [!NOTE] > 不支持泛型类型的封送处理。The does not support marshaling of generic types. ## Examples 下面的示例应用到了字段、 方法参数，以及一种方法在托管类型中返回值。The following example applies the to a field, a method parameter, and a method return value in a managed type. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/cs/marshalasattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/vb/marshalasattribute.vb#1)] 下面的示例应用属性设为一个属性：The following example applies the attribute to a property: [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/cs/Signature1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.MarshalAsAttribute/vb/Signature1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

summary.span: 使用指定的 值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数采用的基础的 16 位有符号的整数来表示每个枚举成员。This constructor takes an underlying 16-bit signed integer that represents each enumeration member. [Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)使用此构造函数。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) uses this constructor.

param.span: 数据将作为该值封送的值。

span.span: The value the data is to be marshaled as.

summary.span: 使用指定的 枚举成员初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关可读的代码是更不易出错，请始终使用此构造函数。For readable code that is less prone to error, always use this constructor.

summary.span: 指定非托管 或 的元素类型。

span.span: Specifies the element type of the unmanaged or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此参数设置为一个介于枚举来指定数组中元素的类型。You can set this parameter to a value from the enumeration to specify the type of the array's elements. 如果不指定的类型，使用默认的非托管类型与托管的数组的元素类型相对应。If a type is not specified, the default unmanaged type corresponding to the managed array's element type is used. 例如，`ArraySubType`为`LPWStr`COM 中的数组是。For example, the `ArraySubType` for a `LPWStr` array in COM is . 有关其他信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md).

summary.span: 指定 COM 使用的非托管 特性的参数索引。

span.span: Specifies the parameter index of the unmanaged attribute used by COM.

summary.span: 向自定义封送处理程序提供附加信息。

span.span: Provides additional information to a custom marshaler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用自定义封送处理程序时，此字段是可选的。This field is optional when using a custom marshaler. 可以将此字段设置为一个字符串，提供到自定义封送处理程序的其他信息。You can set this field to a string that supplies additional information to a custom marshaler. 例如，相同的封送处理程序可提供大量的包装器，其中使用该 cookie 来指示特定的包装器。For example, the same marshaler can be used to provide a number of wrappers, where the cookie is used to indicate the specific wrapper.

summary.span: 指定自定义封送处理程序的完全限定名。

span.span: Specifies the fully qualified name of a custom marshaler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用或字段指定为特性化的参数的自定义封送处理程序类型、 字段或返回类型。You can use either the or field specify a custom marshaler type for the attributed parameter, field, or return type. 字段使你可以指定表示自定义封送处理程序的完全限定的名称的字符串。The field enables you to specify a string representing the fully qualified name of a custom marshaler. 它可用于后期绑定引用，但做法不如用于指定自定义封送处理程序。It is useful for late-bound references, but is less preferred than for specifying a custom marshaler. 有关创建和使用自定义封的其他信息，请参阅[自定义封送处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079)。For additional information about creating and using custom marshalers, see [Custom Marshaling](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079).

## Remarks 你可以使用或字段来指定的特性化的参数的自定义封送处理程序类型、 字段或返回类型。You can use either the or field to specify a custom marshaler type for the attributed parameter, field, or return type. 字段允许更易于使用通过缩短语法。The field allows easier usage of by shortening the syntax. 在下面的示例中，第一行表示语法使用和第二行表示语法使用。In the following example, the first line represents syntax using and the second line represents syntax using . ``` [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.CustomMarshaler, MarshalType = "Assembly, NameSpace.TypeName")] ``` ``` [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.CustomMarshaler, MarshalTypeRef = typeof(NameSpace.TypeName)] ``` 你可以设置对象使用`typeof`在 C# 中，`GetType`在 Visual Basic 中，或`typeid`c + + 中。You can set a object using `typeof` in C#, `GetType` in Visual Basic, or `typeid` in C++. 有关创建和使用自定义封的其他信息，请参阅[自定义封送处理](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079)。For additional information about creating and using custom marshalers, see [Custom Marshaling](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49f9ac47-1619-4d6e-9da6-bf06bba12079).

span.span: Indicates the element type of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此字段设置为从值枚举来指定安全数组的元素的类型。You can set this field to a value from the enumeration to specify the type of the safe array's elements. 如果未指定的类型，则使用托管的元素类型的默认类型 （如果作为 VARIANT 传递）。If a type is not specified, the managed element type's default type (if passed as a VARIANT) is used. 例如，`SafeArraySubType`为`int`COM 中的数组是。For example, the `SafeArraySubType` for an `int` array in COM is . 有关其他信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md).

summary.span: 指示用户定义的 元素类型。

span.span: Indicates the user-defined element type of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化自定义类型，允许的元素与此字段`SAFEARRAY`要封送处理成功。Initialize this field with your custom type to enable the elements of the `SAFEARRAY` to be marshaled successfully. 此字段才需要时是， ，或。This field is only needed when the is either , , or . 有关其他信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md).

summary.span: 指示固定长度数组中的元素数，或要导入的字符串中的字符（不是字节）数。

span.span: Indicates the number of elements in the fixed-length array or the number of characters (not bytes) in a string to import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此字段是必需的和的成员枚举。This field is required for the and members of the enumeration. 因为元数据的压缩的格式仅限于 0x1FFFFFFF，允许的值的范围是 (> = 0 和 < = 0x1FFFFFFF)。Because the compressed format of the metadata is limited to 0x1FFFFFFF, the range of allowed values for are (>= 0 and <= 0x1FFFFFFF). 有关其他信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For additional information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md).

summary.span: 指示从零开始的参数，该参数包含数组元素的计数，与 COM 中的 类似。

span.span: Indicates the zero-based parameter that contains the count of array elements, similar to in COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段支持托管到非托管和非托管到托管调用。The field supports managed-to-unmanaged and unmanaged-to-managed calls. 它没有托管代码调用 COM 对象的任何影响。It does not have any effect on managed code that calls COM objects. 根据托管的类型和应用于它的特性，可以作为安全数组或 C 样式数组传递数组。Depending on the managed type and the attributes applied to it, the array can be passed as a safe array or C-style array. 当作为 C 样式数组传递数组时，封送处理程序无法确定数组的大小。When arrays are passed as C-style arrays, the marshaler cannot determine the size of the array. 因此，若要将托管的数组传递给非托管的函数或方法，必须提供两个自变量：Therefore, to pass an managed array to an unmanaged function or method, you must provide two arguments: - 定义通过引用或值数组。The array, defined by reference or value. - 定义通过引用或值的数组大小。The array size, defined by reference or value. 数组大小参数的从零开始索引定义使用字段。The zero-based index of the array size parameter is defined by using the field. 如果同时指定了和与字段，字段的值的总和为总大小。If you specify both and with a field, the sum of the fields' values produces a size total. 有关详细信息，请参阅[数组的默认封送处理](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md)。For more information, see [Default Marshaling for Arrays](~/docs/framework/interop/default-marshaling-for-arrays.md). ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex/CPP/marshalas.sizeparamindex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex/CS/marshalas.sizeparamindex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.MarshalAsAttribute.SizeParamIndex/VB/marshalas.sizeparamindex.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As UnmanagedType

summary.span: 获取 值，数据将被作为该值封送。

span.span: Gets the value the data is to be marshaled as.

value.span: 值，数据将被作为该值封送。

span.span: The value the data is to be marshaled as.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于以指示应如何在托管和非托管代码之间封送类型。This value is used with to indicate how types should be marshaled between managed and unmanaged code. 在某些情况下，可以使用此字段，某特定`UnmanagedType`枚举成员。In some cases, you can use this field with certain `UnmanagedType` enumeration members. 有关和，必须使用额外的命名的参数。For and , you must use additional named parameters.
